entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
